Movies Project

Welcome to NatMovies’s documentation!

NatMovies is an application that allows users to log in, view available movies, filter them by rating and genre, and add or remove movies.

Contents:

  • Introduction
  • Installation
  • Usage

class movies.models.Movie(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

Model representing a movie in the system.

title

The title of the movie.

Type:

str

description

A brief description of the movie.

Type:

str

release_date

The release date of the movie.

Type:

date

genre

The genre of the movie.

Type:

str

rating

The movie’s rating between 0.0 and 5.0.

Type:

float

cast

A list of actors in the movie.

Type:

list

director

The director of the movie.

Type:

str
